content: *this cuddly bunny blanket buddy is a easy gift for a baby or child lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 50722-2 corrections applied feb 15 2008 skill level easy velvetspun article #580 2 balls crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm split ring stitch markers small amount black worsted weight yarn to embroider face small amount fiberfill stuffing begin at lower corner of blanket worked in row head is worked in rounds ears are worked in row embroidery diagram is provided some construction required to finish see also bunny blanket buddy #50722 knit 1 crocheted bunny blankets are available in other lion brand yarns 81028ad fuzzy bunny baby blanket 2 fishermen s wool® article #150 81029ad eco bunny & 81030ad earth bunny blanket 3 recycled cotton article #482 90355 cuddle bunny blanket 4 quick & cozy article #926 l70260 cuddle bunny blanket - crochet 5 baby soft boucle yarn article #918 designer miwa gemini 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bunny-blanket-buddy-50722-knit 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fuzzy-bunny-baby-blanket 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/eco-bunny---earth-bunny-blanket 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cuddle-bunny-blanket 5 https //www lionbrand com/products/cuddle-bunny-blankie-l70260 _pos=1&_sid=02010e5d3&_ss=r
